attributes.action: Make foreign funding of Mosques in the UK Illegal
attributes.additional_details:
Deobandi Islam is the most common form in UK mosques, growing from colonial India to protect Muslim identity from British influence. It therefore demands not befriending non-muslims, or integrating into British society.
Women have to cover their faces and not travel a distance of more than 48 miles unless accompanied by a male relative (even if the purpose is to attend a religious gathering).

http://www.spectator.co.uk/2014/06/who-runs-our-mosques/

This is not something that should be funded.
attributes.background:
Stop all foreign funding of Mosques in the UK.

Saudi Arabia and Qatar are well-known for funding an ever more regressive, illiberal, and misogynist interpretation of Islam (Deobandi) in the UK.
Removing this funding will help to reduce home-grown Islamic extremism and cultural enclaves
